description: A light and simple chicken salad with the perfect mix of sweet and savoury.
name: Balsamic Chicken, Strawberry & Goats Cheese Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the grill to medium and line a baking tray with foil.
Place the chicken breasts in a bowl, pour over half the balsamic vinegar, half the olive oil and seasoning, then flip the chicken to coat well.
Place the chicken on the baking tray and grill for 10 minutes then turn them over and grill for a further 10 minutes.
For the dressing, add the remaining balsamic vinegar and olive oil, honey and Dijon mustard to a small bowl and whisk to combine.
Slice the chicken and add to a large bowl with the baby spinach and crumbled goats cheese. Pour over dressing, mix well and serve.
